name: ST. JAMES SCHOOL, Petitioner, v. Darryl BIEL, as Personal Representative of the ESTATE OF Kristen BIEL.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
ST. JAMES SCHOOL, Petitioner,
v.
Darryl BIEL, as Personal Representative of the ESTATE OF Kristen BIEL.
attorneys: Motion of Virginia, et al. for leave to participate in oral argument as amici curiae and for divided argument denied. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
casebody.head_matter:
ST. JAMES SCHOOL, Petitioner,
v.
Darryl BIEL, as Personal Representative of the ESTATE OF Kristen BIEL.
No. 19-348.
Supreme Court of the United States.
March 23, 2020.
Motion of Virginia, et al. for leave to participate in oral argument as amici curiae and for divided argument denied. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
